choose.when: SELECT b.board_id, b.member_id AS board_member_id, b.running_data_id, b.content, b.created_date, b.modifided_date, b.main_image_path, b.writer, r.start_latitude, r.start_longitude, r.difficulty, r.running_time, r.title, r.one_line_comment AS one_line_comment, r.created_time, ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(r.start_longitude, r.start_latitude), POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}) ) AS distance FROM board b JOIN running_data r on b.running_data_id = r.running_data_id order by distance asc limit #{startIdx}, 5;
select board_id, member_id, running_data_id, content, created_date, modifided_date, main_image_path, now_latitude, now_longitude from board order by created_date asc limit #{startIdx}, 5

mapper.select: select board_id, member_id, running_data_id, content, created_date, modifided_date, main_image_path, now_latitude, now_longitude from board where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( member_id, running_data_id, content, main_image_path, writer ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{runningDataId}, #{content}, #{mainImagePath}, #{writer} )
